overview: In this titillating tale of the hunter and the hunted, buxom barmaid Brandy sends a ruthless bounty hunter on a wild cooze chase that leads him into some sticky situations! We follow Tex through a series of sizzling sexual encounters as he searches for his prey who's been right under his nose all the time! Will he capture the elusive Tracey? And what will he do with her if he catches her? Don't miss the surprise ending!
title: Hot on Her Tail
